description:
Sakura, Dokuro and Shizuki are on a school trip where they are asked to draw the scenery, but not without Dokuro.
After Dokuro and Zakuro are scared of a "monster" they read about in a myth book, they then want (and force) Sakura to join them in the bath.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: (01/02) Sketching Event! Dokuro-chan! / Bukibuki-goshigoshi Battle! Dokuro-chan!
Shasei Taikai Da yo! Dokuro-chan! / Bukubuku-Goshigoshi Daisakusen Da yo! Dokuro-chan!
しゃせい大会だよ!ドクロちゃん! / ぶくぶくごしごし大作戦だよ!ドクロちゃん!
